meanings.definition: A person who continues to live or exist after facing a dangerous or life-threatening situation.
meanings.sent1: The survivers of the shipwreck were finally rescued.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to support the survivers of the natural disaster.
meanings.sent3: The group of survivers from the haunted house tour laughed about their spooky experience.
meanings.sent4: The survivers of the zombie apocalypse were hailed as heroes for their bravery.
meanings.sent5: The image of the survivers emerging from the wreckage was etched in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: The act of remaining alive or in existence after a difficult or challenging event.
meanings.sent1: The survivers of the marathon felt a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent2: The concept of survival of the fittest highlights the importance of being strong survivers.
meanings.sent3: The survivers of the power outage celebrated when the lights came back on.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, only the most adaptable survivers thrive.
meanings.sent5: The survivers of the storm emerged stronger and more resilient than before.
